title: Graph the First Inequality
text: We must graph $$y<3x+2$$. We graph the line as dashed, and shade below since we have <.\n##figure2.gif##

title: Graph the Second Inequality
text: We must graph $$y>-x+1$$. We graph the line as dashed, and shade above since we have >\n##figure4.gif##

title: The solution is region where shading overlaps Blue-red
